On Mon, 23 May 2005 09:19:28 -0700, Cedric Beust <cbeust@...> wrote:

> I still have a fundamental dislike for any kind of absolutes
> (and in particular, statements that contain "always" or "never").
>

I nearly always find myself undecided about whether something is always or  
never x or all somethings are always or never x or something else etc.

To say this is an heuristic POV might be dogmatic but a good rule of thumb?

A test is important where I think it's important even if I might be wrong.

Cheers

Jim
